name: Advanced Modern Greek II
description: The aim of this course is to facilitate fluency both in spoken and written Modern Greek. Proficiency at this level will be attained through familiarization with various texts and genres including a Modern Greek literature anthology and selected academic articles. Emphasis will be placed on writing which will lead to the production of a short research paper in Modern Greek.
department: Centre for European, Russian and Eurasian Studies
prerequisites: Completion of MGR300H1 or permission of instructor
